import React from 'react'; import { FiDollarSign, FiTrendingUp, FiTrendingDown } from 'react-icons/fi'; import './SummaryCards.css'; const SummaryCards = ({ balance, income, expenses }) => { return (

Total Balance

${balance.toFixed(2)}

Total Income

${income.toFixed(2)}

Total Expenses

${expenses.toFixed(2)}

); }; export default SummaryCards;
